name: Shovel Dwarf
description:
You're a lonely dwarf seeking to save your friends locked in the deep caves that surround you. Armed with your golden shovel, explore the world around and dig a way to your home for you and your friends. But beware ! Because this world is dangerous, and you wont have much time to save them all.

Good luck !

This is a 2 man's game. Thanks a lot to Jean-Baptiste "OnOff" Ammirati for making this game with me.

Check his profile right here : https://itch.io/profile/jb912
